title: Home - Find Your Lost Pet

digitalSupport.subtitle: Digital Support
digitalSupport.title: How exactly do we help you?

websiteInclusion.title: Inclusion on our website
websiteInclusion.description: Your pet is added to our page, making reporting observations especially convenient.

printablePoster.title: Printable poster
printablePoster.description: Receive a professionally designed lost pet poster with QR code.

observationReports.title: Receive observation reports
observationReports.description: Check new observations reported by the community to track leads about your pet.

pushNotifications.title: Push notifications
pushNotifications.description: Receive instant alerts when a lost or found pet is reported in your vicinity.

unitingTechnology.title: Technology that unites pet lovers
unitingTechnology.description: Our application connects people with a common goal – to help find lost pets. A community that collaborates and cares.

mobileOptimized.title: Mobile-optimized platform
mobileOptimized.description: Whether using a phone or tablet – our platform is adapted for comfortable and fast use on all devices. Access what you need anytime and anywhere.

appExperience.title: App experience – in browser
appExperience.description: Add our platform to your device's home screen and use it like a real app. No download from store – simple, fast, and always available.

artificialIntelligence.title: Artificial Intelligence for your pet's benefit
artificialIntelligence.description: Our AI assistant answers questions about pets – from daily care to emergency situations. Knowledge always at hand so you feel safe and informed.

mapBanner.title: Have you lost a pet?
mapBanner.description: Use our application to post a lost or found pet advertisement.

petPath.title: Smart and convenient post management
petPath.description: Thanks to the convenient design and filters, searching among posts becomes simple and pleasant. Save posts to your profile so you can easily track their status at any time.

mapBannerDeepBottom.title: Practical pet care tips
mapBannerDeepBottom.description: Learn how to best care for your pet – from daily care to emergency situations. Practical tips, guides, and answers to important questions all in one place.
